instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Badware mengacu pada aplikasi perangkat lunak yang mencoba untuk mengunduh software tambahan yang sangat sedikit atau tidak ada penjelasan.
output: Badware refers to software applications that try to download additional software with very little or no explanation.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Dalam sebuah pernyataan, pemerintah mengatakan bahwa "mayat-mayat lebih dari 100 pemberontak telah dibersihkan dari pinggir jalan di luar kota Harf Sufyan."
output: In a statement, the government said that "the bodies of more than 100 rebels have been recovered from the roadside outside the town of Harf Sufyan."

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Sidang pertama berakhir dengan pembatalan sidang setelah satu juri menerima surat ancaman.
output: The first trial ended in a mistrial after one juror received a threatening letter.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Skor final pada kontes tidak berimbang - Sunnybank Dragon 36 mengalahkan Sunshine Coast Stingrays 6.
output: The final score in a lop side contest — Sunnybank Dragons 36 defeated Sunshine Coast Stingrays 6.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: "Jadi pertanyaannya bukan mengapa kami tidak bertemu dengan Tehran."
output: "So the question isn't why will we not talk to Tehran."

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: David Hempleman-Adams meninggalkan St. John's sekitar pukul 09.30 malam waktu setempat pada tanggal 2 Juli 2007 dari St. John's, Newfoundland, dan Labrador di dalam sebuah balon udara helium kecil untuk percobaan penyeberangan Trans-Atlantik dengan balon terkecil yang pernah menyeberanginya.
output: David Hempleman-Adams left St. John's at approximately 9:30 p.m. local time on July 2, 2007 from St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador in a small helium filed balloon in an attempt to make the Trans-Atlantic crossing in the smallest balloon ever to make such a crossing.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Pengemudi jeep mempunyai istri dan bayi perempuan berusia 2 bulan di desa.
output: The driver of the jeep had his wife and two months old daughter in the village.
